subject: Re: Simsonn x Eric - UGC for gamers?
description_text:
Hey Simsonn Team,


Just circling back in case you didn’t see my last email - I’d love to work
with Simsonn if possible.


Whether you need something funny, informative, or just real and watchable,
I’ve got ideas. Let me know if you want me to send an idea over.


Best,

Eric Ambrosio


UGC Creator | Good at making your brand look good
